pages.title: Booflo
pages.text: These inhabitants of Poise Forests in the End are often found hopping and floating around hunting Puff Bugs.$(br)Booflo can be bred with Poise Clusters or tamed with Bolloom Fruits. Once tamed, you can ride these floating creatures among the End Islands.

pages.name: Booflo
pages.text: You might want to take your distance while they eat, as they can become agressive...
